text: Huaxia Life Insurance Co., Ltd. known also as Hua Insurance in English, is a Chinese insurance company based in Tianjin. In July 2020, the Chinese government announced that it would take over the company. ==Equity investments== * Guangzhou Aoyu (46.04%) * Leshi Zhixin (1.1310%) * Ping An Insurance (3.40%) ==Shareholders== * (20.00%) * (20.00%) * (14.90%) * (13.40%) * (13.37%) * (11.24%) * Tianjin Port Group (5.23%) * (0.98%) * (0.35%) * (0.30%) * (0.13%) * (0.09%) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Life insurance companies of China Category:Companies based in Tianjin Category:Chinese companies established in 2006 Category:Financial services companies established in 2006 Category:Privately held companies of China
title: Huaxia Life Insurance
